snippet: Edward Cheserek, a runner from Kenya who attends St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark, will compete in the National Scholastic Indoor Championships beginning Friday at the Armory in Upper Manhattan.
abstract: Profile of Edward Cheserek, high school runner from Kenya who attends St Benedict’s Preparatory in Newark; Cheserek is preparing to compete in the National Scholastic Indoor Championships at the Armory in Upper Manhattan, where in January he ran the second-fastest indoor mile by a high school student.
lead_paragraph: Edward Cheserek, a runner from Kenya who attends St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark, will compete in the National Scholastic Indoor Championships beginning Friday at the Armory in Upper Manhattan.

headline.seo: Edward Cheserek Is Turning Heads, Setting Track Records
headline.main: High School Star Is in a Hurry, Leaving Records Behind
headline.print_headline: High School Star Is in a Hurry, Leaving Records Behind
